name: smartelf
0:
”Alexa,turn on Kitchen light.”
”Alexa,set Bedroom light to 20 percent.”
”Alexa,dim the living room to 20%.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
SmartELF make your life more smart!

This skill works on SmartELF Devices. 

For example, you can change the light's color by just calling alexa, and can change the brightness of the light by a simple voice.

You can control your light remote by adapt this skill,and can get more function by using the SmartElf App.
